mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO player_form ( id, season_week, team_id, form, hidden_form, expected_form ) VALUES ( #{player.id}, #{player.seasonWeek}, #{player.teamId}, #{player.form}, #{player.hiddenForm}, #{player.expectedForm} );
mapper.select: SELECT id, season_week, team_id, form, hidden_form, expected_form FROM player_form WHERE team_id = #{teamId} ORDER BY season_week;
